meta_description: The Whatcom Museum provides innovative and interactive educational programs and exhibitions about art, nature, and Northwest history.

## UPCOMING EVENTS

See what’s happening at the Whatcom Museum. Join us for art exhibitions, educational programs, museum events, family activities, and more throughout the year. Discover something new every time you visit.

#### [Dinner & Curator Tours – _myself inside your story_ & _Meander_ January 14 @ 5:30 pm \- 8:00 pmThe Lightcatcher](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114042402/https://www.whatcommuseum.org/event/dinner-curator-tours-myself-inside-you...
